node.display_long_description:
OhShape是一款能够带来独一无二全身活动的音乐节奏类游戏。每张地图都需要躲避障碍，打击墙壁和做出可爱造型。通过游戏获取奖励，做自己的超级明星。

官方支持定制歌曲

享受前所未有的畅快感觉，享受无穷无尽的快乐。

OhShape给所有家庭带来快乐。通过4个不同难度的关卡和许多游戏设置，您能够定制适合自己技术的体验，并且感受不断练习带来的提升。

关键特色：

• 充满乐趣的全身锻炼体验
• 32个精雕细琢关卡，4个不同难度
• 派对模式：和家人，朋友一起参与游戏
• 练习模式：联系关卡中的一个片段
• 为最活跃用户提供的挑战模式
• 容易上手的定制歌曲关卡编辑器
• 跨平台在线排行榜

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
v 1.8.0 - Electro Party - Holidays 2020
—————————————————————
• New Album: Electro Party DLC with an exclusive dark environment!
• A time-limited holiday theme, play it now!
• Challenges & Leaderboards have arrived for you in Quest to show off your skills with the community!
• Some love for the newcomers:
  • New difficulty naming
  • Enhanced tutorial to get you ready for the fun!
  • Improved feedback upon failing a wall
• Small room mode upgraded
• We found a few little bugs and we took care of them!

node.display_short_description: The new "Electro Party" music pack takes you into a wild party with upbeat electronic music, vibrant moving elements, and electricity. A lot of electricity. With the first dark environment, give in to the lights, adrenaline, and dance to powerful tracks such as "PumpUpTheBass" and "Detonate". Let your emotions out, and party with OhShape!

nodes.title: OhShape Update brings the Electro Party DLC, Challenges and more
nodes.body_text:
Holidays are around the corner and OhShape has just released a very special update to celebrate! The main course of this update is the first ever DLC “Electro Party”, a music pack that takes you into a wild party with upbeat electronic music, vibrant moving elements, and electricity. A lot of electricity! This new album features a dark environment that resembles an epic disco stage, something widely demanded by the OhShape community. The Electro Party music pack includes 8 new songs:

-"Attack" by Red City Hero
-"Detonate" by Stretched
-"Is This All There" by Arch Tremors
-"Keeping Love Alive" by Guest of Rapture
-"Pump Up The Bass" by Fassounds
-"Radio Love" by Tyler Fiore
-"Save Me" by Kiba
-"The One" by Fassounds

The Electro Party DLC is available for $2.99 on the Oculus Quest and Steam, with the PSVR version coming soon at the same price.


Challenges in Oculus Quest

From now on, Quest players will also enjoy the Challenges feature where each week they will be able to join 2 exclusive challenges with different songs and modifiers, each featuring a different leaderboard. Players can compete on the global leaderboard and can challenge a friend to beat their score. Let the true competition begin!


Newcomers welcome!

The Odders Lab team has been doing a deep research around the feedback received from the community and some adjustments have been made so the new players can have a better experience with OhShape. There is a new difficulty naming that provides a clearer information about the challenge and the skills the player needs to master each level.

nodes.title: Track your fitness in OhShape!
nodes.body_text: We’re seeing more and more of you turn to VR to stay active while at home. Oculus Move is a new platform feature that helps you track your calories burned and physically active minutes you play any game or app, including OhShape. Set goals, check your progress and have fun while you work out. The Oculus team let us know that they’re rolling Oculus Move out gradually, so some Quest and Quest 2 users will have access to this platform feature starting today. Find Oculus Move in your library!

node.reviewDescription:
This is a great game for a workout, especially on the higher difficulties. Has me sweating quicker than any other rhythm game, even Beat Saber on Expert+!

Please add extra information on the leaderboards though. Just the score doesn't tell me much at all - I can't really tell how well I did. I want to know what my highest grade letter was, my highest combo, whether I got a full combo etc. This kind of information makes me want to keep playing songs and improve, but if I only see the score I'm really not sure how well I actually did or if I can improve much or not.
A comparison at the end of a play through a song on the results screen to my previous high would be even better. These things are what I love the most about rhythm games such as beatmania IIDX. Please have a look at beatmania IIDX's results screen and score tracking and if you can emulate something like this it would be awesome!

Overall a really fun game though and some tracks you can really feel like you're dancing if you get into the rhythm :)
node.reviewTitle: Great game, enjoying the new DLC, but...
